title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reflects on the NBA's All-Star weekend the celebrated the top 75 players in the league's 75 year history and why Michael Jordan remains the most popular player in the world. He discusses Michigan head coach Juwan Howard throwing a punch after an altercation with Wisconsin head coach Greg Gard and why high profile head coaches need to be held to a higher standard. He explains why he was right about Tom Brady and wrong about Zion Williamson. Plus, NBA champion Antoine Walker joins the show to tell Colin if LeBron James is serious about a return to the Cavaliers. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
